## FASTElement.attributeChangedCallback() method

The attribute changed callback for this FASTElement.

**Signature:**

```typescript
attributeChangedCallback(name: string, oldValue: string | null, newValue: string | null): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

name


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The name of the attribute that changed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

oldValue


</td><td>

string \| null


</td><td>

The previous value of the attribute.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

newValue


</td><td>

string \| null


</td><td>

The new value of the attribute.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

This method is invoked by the platform whenever an observed attribute of FASTElement has a value change.
